transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Ji, ha boliye company se baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Meri baat Dutta ji se ho rahi hai, right?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan ji, ha ji Dutta ji se baat kar raha tha IndiaMART office se kya hai sir?

Customer: Haan chal raha hai sir aapka baat boliye.

Executive: Haan ji, ha ji sir aapka discussion hua hoga na Utkarsh ke sath aur Utkarsh ke jo manager hai, main unka business manager baat kar raha tha. Kuch sir services mein issues aa rahe hain aapne bola hua hai services band karne ke liye.

Customer: Haan dekhiye sir jo sales team ne jo bataya tha mere ko, theek hai? Maine point bataya hai Utkarsh sir ko.

Customer: Bolne pe sir sales team mein jo mere ko bataya tha.

Customer: Haan wo sir false the, theek hai? Wo jo Utkarsh ji ko maine bataya.

Customer: Jaise sir unhone bataya tha ki jo brand pe main deal karta hu uske regarding mere ko bahut sare client milenge.

Customer: Theek hai? Ye maine bataya hai Utkarsh sir ko, Utkarsh ji ko aur dekhiye jaise maine bataya tha maine jaise catalog jaise create karunga jo mere ko buyers milenge jo lead milenge wo kya first time mere se baat karenge?

Customer: Matlab main hi kya first hu wo wo deal wo un log se main deal kar raha hu to unhone bola tha haan.

Customer: Par waisa to nahi ho raha hai un log to 10 jan se already baat kar chuke hain uske baad mera rate lena hai aur unhone teen number unhone ye bataya tha ki client log ko pata hai ki advance payment karna hai.

Customer: Matlab sab client ko ye pata hai ki IndiaMART mein agar kuch kharidna hai to advance payment se kharidna hai ye bhi jhoot hai.

Customer: Ye bhi jo hum jo client se jab advance payment ka baat bol rahe hain sab client mana kar de rahe hain bol rahe hain pehle material mere ko receive hoga uske baad nahi to main cash on delivery karunga aur nahi to aapko uske baad hi main paisa dunga.

Executive: Nahi sir ye to customer to customer depend karta hai na sir. Matlab ye to sir customer se baat karne pe pata chalega kuch customer 100% mein bhi ready ho jate hain.

Customer: Nahi sir koi bhi customer aise ready nahi ho raha hai 100% se. Maine to Utkarsh ko bataya.

Executive: Ye theek hai sir ye jo cheez hai na payment wali payment wali cheez kahin na kahin.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Par dekhiye sales team mein jaise bataya tha ki customer jaise client log ko malum hai advance payment ke liye to ye to malum hi nahi hai un log ko.

Customer: Aur dusra cheez ye mera brand ke upar jo hai mere ko ye milega jo product hai wo us cheez ka hi mere ko sale karna padega.

Customer: To mera brand ke liye mera jo brand hai aur jisme main deal deal karta hu to usme hi to mere ko ye nahi mil raha hai client nahi mil raha hai.

Customer: Aur dusra cheez ye sir aap to Shiron Shiron sir kaun sa brand hai apna ye Shiron jo dikh raha hai ye brand hai?

Customer: Shiron hai, Heltium hai.

Executive: Inki apne pass bilkul leads nahi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Kya bole?

Executive: Inki apne pass bilkul bhi leads nahi aa rahi hai aap keh rahe ho?

Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi ekdam nahi aa rahi.

Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Haan.

Customer: Utkarsh ji phone kar rahe hain.
Executive: Is brand mein sir aur log bhi is brand mein sir aur log bhi business karte hain ya aapka apna khud ka brand hai ye?

Customer: Khud ka to nahi hai manufacturing se aata hai.

Executive: Manufacturing se aata hai. Brand khud ka nahi hai aapne iske distributorship wagera le rakhi hai kya?

Customer: Haan haan haan.

Executive: Isme sir agar main dekhu aapka.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Haan kya hai?

Executive: Bilkul sir is brand mein leads to kam hai lekin sir agar aap dekhoge to aise to sir market mein aur logon ke apne khud ke bhi brand hai chhote chhote wo bhi sir IndiaMART use karte hain kahin na kahin shayad thoda sa buyer ko convince karna padta hai apne brand ke benefit batane padte hain pricing batana padta hai costing saste pad rahi hai hai na margin theek hai bahut sari cheeze batani padti hai tab to sir customer thoda sa convince hoga aisa nahi hai ki sir koi dusra brand lene aa raha hai to aap apna brand nahi de sakte use.

Customer: Nahi wahi to bol rahe hain wo log brand specific hai jo customer jo client mere ko mil rahe hain sab brand specific hai matlab ek bhi customer waisa nahi mila ki hum apna brand sale kar de. Maine bataya hai ki dekhiye jaisa aap jo quality dhoond rahe hain jaise aap dusra company ka koi quality dhoond rahe hain wahi brand aapko chahiye par mera brand bhi sahi hai uska koi complaint nahi hai wo hum private hospital mein supply karte hain par client to nahi manna chah raha hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Aur ye baat to chhodiye aap mere dekhiye jaise mera partner bhi hai hum bhi hai ye bataya tha hum log ko ki jo client jo milenge first hum log hi deal karenge agar client ko panch panch se 10 agar quotation aise hi nahi gaya to un log to rate to market wo log to sale hi nahi hoga hum log ka.

Customer: Agar 10 to jagah se aapko rate mil gaya to kaise sale hoga hum log ko pata tha ki hum hum log rate denge hum log first honge un log se deal deal karne ke liye to sale to milega hi milega waisa.

Customer: Par wo client se hum pooch rahe hain ki aap matlab hum aise agar rate de aise 10 jagah se rate de client bata raha hai ki main to panch jan se baat kar chuka hu mere ko 8 rate mila hai koi koi bataya 7 koi koi bataya 6 to hum aap se kyun le.

Customer: Aap bataiye tab ye iska kya matlab solution hai.

Executive: Theek hai. Haan. Wo cheez sir aapki theek hai but sir aap ye cheez dekhiye kahin na kahin sir aap mere ko agar bataye aap mere ko agar bataye ki aapko aapko jo client milega jo buylead milega daily bonus ka jo 10 milta hai theek hai 10 mein se agar do bhi aisa mil gaya ki ek ye matlab wo wo first main deal kar raha hu waisa to nahi ho raha hai ekdam client log already char panch jan 10 jan se baat kar already chuke hain.

Executive: Nahi sir ye lead ek lead aisa nahi hai ki ek lead jo aa rahi hai wo sirf aap hi ke pass ja rahi hai wo teen char aur bhi logon ke pass jati hai to be very frank hai na aur ek ke pass bejne se koi fayda bhi nahi hai agar ek lead kisi ek hi ke pass bejenge to wo agar man lo deal nahi kar paya ya price match nahi hua to to fir wo buyer waste ho jayega to sir hume ek ko to dene se koi matlab hi nahi hai.

Customer: Agar deal nahi kar paya uske baad na bheje aap log agar deal nahi kar paya uske baad na bheje hum log to ye to mere ko batana chahiye na jab aap log sale kar rahe hain ye mere ko agar main deal nahi kar paya uske baad aap dijiye wo client dusra jan ko par wo to mere ko nahi bataya tha sales team ne ki agar hum deal nahi kar payenge uske baad milega ye to nahi ho raha hai na wo log panch jan 10 jan se already baat kar chuke hain.

Customer: Man lijiye hum deal nahi kar pa rahe uske baad aap dijiye na buyer ko dusra seller seller log ko aur mere ko to pata hona chahiye na kya ho raha hai hum kya use jo karna ja rahe hain use uska kya matlab facility hai nahi hai wo to mere ko false cheez bataya false cheez se aap matlab ye hua aap log ka jo sales team hai ye batayega kyun mere ko ki aap se hi should deal hoga ye to batana nahi chahiye na.

Executive: Nahi wo cheez sir theek hai but sir aisa nahi hai matlab dekhiye business karne ke liye to har customer aata hai hai na kuch cheeze chalo main manta hu main ye nahi keh raha aap galat keh rahe ho aap theek keh rahe ho apni jagah galat bataya hai kuch information aapke pass galat bhi di gayi hai I agree but sir dekhiye ab agar un cheezon ko main chhod du agar apan aage business ki baat karte hain sir to aapke product line mein business achcha hai aisa nahi hai aap bhi jante ho IndiaMART pe requirement achchi aati hai aur one year ka plan hai sir aaj nahi to kal business to nikalna hi hai theek hai but wo thoda sa brand ki jo problem hai sir wo har customer sir jiska brand chhota hai ya khud ka brand hai thodi bahut waisa aap jaise bata rahe hain requirement baad mein requirement to bahut sara aa rahi hai par customer ko jab rate de rahe hain wo already 10 jan se baat kar chuka hai aap samajh rahe hain mera baat nahi 10 logon se baat nahi karta sir aise to sir aise to sir koi bhi agar mujhe requirement hai kaise pata chalega main sabse pehle IndiaMART pe dal raha hu ho sakta hai main market mein bhi dekh raha hu cheh jagah aur dekh raha hu IndiaMART pe bhi dal raha hu sirf aisa buyer lana jisko requirement hai aur sirf aapko hi mile puri India mein aisa to sir possible nahi ho payega mera mera jo kam hai wo private hospital se supply hai waha par kya hota hai 10 jan log quotation dete hain tender dete hain jiska kam nikalta hai wo log ki milta hai aur nahi to dusra dusra brand mein jo deal karte hain man lijiye main ek to brand mein deal karta hu wo dusra jan deal karta hai to ye ye brand mere ko milta hai wo cheez hum supply karte hain aur dusra brand alag ko milta hai wo cheez hum supply karte hain to ye main baat aapko sales team ko bataya tha jaise to aap log ka sales team bataya ki hum first honge ki deal karne ke liye humko wo easy laga isliye hum usi ke liye na hum aage badhe na hum to nahi to aage nahi badhte na platform ke liye.

Executive: Nahi wo cheez theek hai sir aapki but dekhiye aisa nahi hai sir dekhiye is product mein business hai ab sir wahi hai ki is tarike se commitment to main aapko nahi bolunga ki haan but sir aap business lene aaye hain IndiaMART business platform hai aaj nahi kal business to sir milna hi hai thodi si brand ki problem to sir har kisi ko aati hai jiska bhi chhota brand hai ya naya brand hai ya khud ka brand hai to usko branding ke liye sir kahin na kahin jo branded products hai un un wale customer ko hi todna padega hai na unko tod ke apne brands ke benefit batane padenge quality batani padegi pricing batani padegi margin batana padega tabhi wo customer bade brand se aur aapke brand pe move karega hai na ab wo cheez mein sir thoda samay to lagta hi hai aap bhi jante ho wo to nahi nahi nahi wo to maine bataya hai dekhiye samay lagega dekhiye aise abhi ho raha hai samne ja ke bhi aisa hoga aur aap jo customer hai wo log to verified hi nahi hai ki wo to information hi nahi hai un log ki advance payment chaliye wo customer man bhi liya mera baat ki brand mein hum deal karte hain ye brand bhi wo bhi maine Utkarsh ji ko bataya hai ye kuch customer raji bhi ho sakte hain par payment ke liye wo log manna hai uske baad hmm hmm un log ko pata hi nahi hai payment ka to sir aap bhi samajhdar hain aap khud bhi business karte honge sir jaise aapke buyer hain waise yaha buyer aate hain sir koi hamare apne personal buyer to hai nahi wo to sir aapko dekhiye aapas mein understanding hai ki 50% advance pay ya kis tarike se aapko deal karni hai business karna hai wo to sir dekhiye thoda sa dekhna padega na aap apne level pe 50% chhod dijiye hum to 10% bolte hain 50% ka to baat hi nahi ho raha hum to matlab jo customer mila tha humko jo jaise jo log man ja rahe hain main to panch jan ka sirf 10% hi bola tha 4000 ka aapka deal tha maine 400 advance manga tha unse right hmm hmm ye cheez theek hai main samajh raha hu sir aapki ab wo sab dekhiye sir thoda aapko samajhna padega baki sir aap mujhe bataye matlab kya aap band karne ke liye bol rahe hain aap haan aisa to nahi chalega sir humko to lagta hai ki aisa to samne ja ke bhi sale shayad nahi hoga ekdam Utkarsh ji bataye bataiye sir ya to main dekhiye aapko bolta hu ki mere hisab se to aapko continue karna chahiye baki sir aur aap ek din leke soch lijiye kal mujhe ek bar final batayiyega main ek bari aage baat karke usko fir karwata hu sir theek hai to Utkarsh ji ko bata dete hain to ek din ka samay le lijiye sir aaram se aaj kal ek bar soch ke mujhe bata dijiyega band karne ka hai to main kal isko aage band karne ke liye HOD se approval leke aur ek do din ke andar sir karwa dunga koi dikkat nahi hai sir par mere khayal se aap ek din ka samay lijiye ek bar sochiye kya karna hai kya nahi jaisa rahega Utkarsh ko phone kar dena nahi to mujhe is number pe aap call kar lena hmm ye aapka do din dekh lo aap haan ye mera number hai aap isko call is pe call kar sakte hain haan is pe kar lo nahi to Utkarsh ke number pe kar lena Utkarsh ka number hai aapke pass haan haan hai Utkarsh ko kar lena aap koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai bata dena jaisa bhi hai accordingly fir process kar dunga sir dekhiye refund karne ki koi dikkat nahi hai sir band karne band karke jo bhi hoga apna aur wo karwa denge sir koi dikkat nahi hai mere hisab se to sir aapko chalana chahiye baki aap ek bar aur soch lijiye theek hai theek hai hum kal dekh lete hain ek bar kya milta hai isme wagera haan bilkul baki sir uske alawa ek aapka kuch issue tha wo Utkarsh ne aap se subah discuss kiya hoga ek complaint aapne dala tha right to wo abhi yaha se solve aapka ho hi gaya tha wo main abhi band kar raha hu theek hai aur ye aap mujhe kal tak soch ke bata dijiyega jaisa rahega main kar dunga theek hai theek hai sir okay sir thank you sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- False commitments by sales team regarding leads.

- Clients are brand-specific, unable to sell own brand.

- Clients are not ready to pay in advance.

- Believes sales will not improve in the future.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive suggested to continue the subscription.

- Executive offered to process the cancellation if desired.

- Executive mentioned resolving the previous complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will decide whether to cancel subscription.

- Customer will inform the executive of decision tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, brand, advance payment
